title: Flamingo UX/UI Improvements_II
description:
Description
  As a PO of the O3 Team
I would like to support several improvements of Flamingo UX/UI
So that business value for Sales & end customers is increased by faster realization of requests at better quality (resulting in NPS increases)
Features i.e.:
MAGBUS-104551 - Implementation of Speedport 7 in AGB Chain: Verify if any action (configuration) required at O3 & support E2E Tests
MAGBUS-99457 Remove VP/VO Mapping from O3, final step at https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/VP-Nummern+Validierung as soon as Flamingo implementation is completed
Improve Error Messages
check # occurrences per error message + possibly derive more US in context
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=MBFY&title=O3+-+Error+messages
https://wiki-ref.telekom.de/display/MBFY/O3+-+Error+Messages
Flamingo Overview:
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/BP%3A+Order+Placement+Error+messages
https://wiki-ref.telekom.de/display/MBFY/BP%3A+Order+Placement+Error+messages
